lines.text: Hey, Mr. Kot-tair!
Love means never having to hear i'm pregnant

[whenever he raises his hand]
OOOOOOHHHHH! OOOOOOHHHHH! OOOOOOHHHHH!
What? Where?
Kotter, these kids couldn't pass a blood test without cheating.
[repeated line]
Up your nose with a rubber hose!

[frequent introduction]
Hellooohhhh. How are ya? I am Arnold HorshAAAAAck.
[when Arnold became a cult member]
What is? is. What was? will be. What will be *was*, but will be again.
I'm so confused.
Hi there.

[brainstorming ideas to raise money to save their class]
We could have a casino night.
Gambling in school? Do you realize the odds are almost 5 to 1 against that happening?
I'll take that bet.
"Epstein's mother's veterinarian".
I'm going to put a window over there.
[points to the door]
And a door over there.
[points to the window]
So then you'll come in through the door!

[Vincent Barbarino said this, often, to other Sweat-Hogs, whenever someone angered him]
Off my case, toilet-face!
Did I ever tell you about my Uncle Max?
Love means never having to hear I'm pregnant
Hey! Up your nose with a rubber hoses!
Yeah? Well, up your gizzard with a rubber lizard!
